title: Jack Slater III
description: L.A. cop Jack Slater is on the chase after The Ripper takes a group of children hostage, including Jack’s son.
quote: Do you want to be a farmer? Here’s a couple of acres.
altHero: closeup of Arnold as Jack Slater
alt3: the Ripper, a man with long hair and scarred face
alt4: the Ripper raises an axe at Jack’s son
